snippet.title: Wacambria Island Trailer - 2024 | Exploration - Treasure & More!
snippet.description:
Explore ancient ruins for treasure and upgrades while avoiding traps and solving puzzles in this retro inspired Action-Adventure RPG. Slash your way through dangerous creatures with a variety of weapons. Explore a diverse island full of hidden secrets and learn to wield a mysterious power.

LEARN MORE:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1842680/Wacambria_Island/
#retrostyle #indiegame #pcgames #templegame
